CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 6, 1957, pg. 17 reads: "5. The M. Lifsher and Son booth showing Saf-T-Tilt window won by Mrs. Fannie Nelson, 2166 Elmore Sq. James (Jim) H. Bloom, left, and representatives made the award"
TitMainTitle: James (Jim) H. Bloom standing at Saf-T-Tilt window won by Fannie Nelson, posed in M. Lifsher & Son window company booth in Syria Mosque for the 1957 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Syria Mosque (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
